nodes.text: The Vigilance was a custom DC-17 hand blaster manufactured by Theed Arms and later awarded to Clone Captain CT-7567, nicknamed "Rex," during the Clone Wars, for his part in preventing the release of the Blue Shadow Virus on Naboo. The Vigilance—like its counterpart, the Negotiator—was specially plated with chromium.

The Vigilance could only be obtained by participating in the first anniversary celebration of the 2010 video game  Clone Wars Adventures, but became purchasable afterwards for 299 Station Cash. Simply logging into the game on September 16, 2011 would grant the player the Vigilance as a free gift.
